\makeatletter
\pgfmathdeclarefunction{ProbXpos}{1}{%
\begingroup%
\pgfmathparse{ln(#1/(1-#1))/ln 10}%
\pgfmath@smuggleone\pgfmathresult%
\endgroup}%

\pgfmathdeclarefunction{ProbXposA}{1}{%
\begingroup%
\pgfmathparse{ln((1-#1)*#1+2)/ln 10}%
\pgfmath@smuggleone\pgfmathresult
\endgroup}%

\pgfmathdeclarefunction{ProbXposApre}{1}{%
\begingroup%
\pgfmathparse{ln((1-#1)*ln((1-#1)+2)/ln 10) }%
\pgfmath@smuggleone\pgfmathresult
\endgroup}%

\pgfmathdeclarefunction{ProbXposAprere}{1}{%
\begingroup%
\pgfmathparse{ln((1-#1)*ln((1-#1)+1.9999)/ln 10) }%
\pgfmath@smuggleone\pgfmathresult
\endgroup}%
\makeatother

\newcommand{\pos}[2]{ProbXpos{#2}/ProbXposA(#1)}


%% #1 = starting value (initially 0)
%% #2 = number of comparisons
%% #3 = threshold value
%% #4 = number of iterations
\newcommand{\ifLeftSidedZero}[5]{%
  \def\irun{#4}%
  \pgfmathparse{#1/100*100*cos( ((#2-#1)/#4 ) * pi r  - (pi r*#3)/#4 )  + #1}%

    \xdef\iffirst{y}
    \xdef\imax{#4}
  \else
    \xdef\iffirst{y n}
    \xdef\imax{#4 - 1}
  \fi
  \foreach \run in {#4,...,1}{%
    \pgfmathparse{#1/100*100*cos( ((#2-#1)/#4 ) * pi r  - (pi r*#3)/#4 )  + #1}%
    \ifdim\pgfmathresult pt<#3 pt\relax
      \xdef\iffirst{y y}
      \xdef\imax{#4 - 1}
    \else
      \pgfmathparse{ProbXpos(#1)==ProbXposA(#1)}%
      \ifdim\pgfmathresult pt==0pt\relax%
        \pgfmathparse{ProbXposA(#1)+ProbXposAprere(#1)}%
        \ifdim\pgfmathresult pt>#3 pt\relax
          \xdef\iffirst{y y #1}
          \xdef\imax{#4 - 1}
        \fi%
      \fi
    \fi%
  }%
  \ifnum\imax<#4\relax
    \xdef\imax{\imax}%
    \foreach \run in {#4,...,1}{%
%       \typeout{if($\iffirst y \dots$) + ($\iflast x \dots$)}%
      \fi

            \xdef\iffirst{y y}
          \fi%

    }%
    \xdef\imax{\imax}%
